timeline.message:
GEODE-7820: Avoid Unnecessary toArray Invocations

Avoid unnecessary invocations to the 'toArray' method and directly
use the java collection received instead.

timeline.bodyText: I think we could get rid of getRecipientsArray() with a little more work.  It's only used until we get down to the messaging layer (GMSMembership.send(), DirectChannel.sendToMany()).  That would get rid of an array-copy for every message we send.
timeline.author: bschuchardt

replies.bodyText: Sounds good @bschuchardt, will make the changes, thanks!.
replies.author: jujoramos

timeline.bodyText: You could replace The Arrays.toString() here with "recipients".  There is at least one other place in the code doing this same thing that you could change.
timeline.author: bschuchardt

timeline.bodyText: I think this could just be getRecipients().toString()
timeline.author: bschuchardt

timeline.message: GEODE-7820: Further clean up and removal of getRecipientsArray.
